com.variant.share.schema

Interface State


  • public interface State
    Representation of the /states[] array element.
    Since:
    0.5

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Optional<java.util.List<StateScopedHook>> getHooks()
      List of state-scoped lifecycle hooks, as provided by the /states[]/hooks element.
      java.util.List<Variation> getInstrumentedVariations()
      A list of variations which instrument this state.
      java.lang.String getName()
      This state's name, as provided by the /states[]/name element.
      java.util.Optional<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getParameters()
      Sate parameters defined by this state, as provided by the /states[]/parameters element.
      Schema getSchema()
      The containing variation schema.
      boolean isInstrumentedBy(Variation variation)
      Is this state instrumented by a given variation.

    • Method Detail

      • getSchema

        Schema getSchema()
        The containing variation schema.
        Returns:
        An object of type Schema. Cannot be null.
        Since:
        0.6

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        This state's name, as provided by the /states[]/name element.
        Returns:
        The name of this state. Cannot be null.
        Since:
        0.5

      • getParameters

        java.util.Optional<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getParameters()
        Sate parameters defined by this state, as provided by the /states[]/parameters element.
        Returns:
        An Optional, containing immutable map of state parameters, or empty if the /states[]/parameters element was omitted.
        Since:
        0.6

      • getHooks

        java.util.Optional<java.util.List<StateScopedHook>> getHooks()
        List of state-scoped lifecycle hooks, as provided by the /states[]/hooks element.
        Returns:
        An Optional, containing immutable list of StateScopedHook objects in the order they were defined, or empty if the /states[]/hooks element was omitted.
        Since:
        0.8

      • getInstrumentedVariations

        java.util.List<Variation> getInstrumentedVariations()
        A list of variations which instrument this state. Includes both online and offline variations.
        Returns:
        An immutable list of Variation objects. Cannot be null but may be empty.
        Since:
        0.5

      • isInstrumentedBy

        boolean isInstrumentedBy(Variation variation)
        Is this state instrumented by a given variation. In other words, is a given variation contained in the list, returned by #getInstrumentedVariants()?
        Parameters:
        variation - The variation of interest.
        Returns:
        true if this state is instrumented by the given variation, or false otherwise.
        Since:
        0.5
